column4: my guess would be to Ctrl+Alt+F2, log in, and run it from that terminal.
i tried what you suggested but still it says i should exit first X server? any ideas?

I don't know for sure, but I think it's telling you that you must completely quit X. Which would mean, if you started X with startx, quit X. If you started it by virtue of booting, you need to reboot to CLI mode. Other people can tell you better ways to boot into CLI mode better than I.
